level.text: A colony shall be selected from European stock bred for gentleness and non- swarming characteristics. No Africanized bees may be maintained in the District.

If a colony exhibits unusual aggressive characteristics by stinging or attempting to sting without due provocation, or exhibits an unusual disposition toward swarming, the beekeeper shall promptly re-queen the colony with a marked queen.
The Mayor may destroy a colony of a beekeeper who fails to fulfill the requirements of this section.
